mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (USER_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, SEX, PHONE, AGE, INSERT_DATE, DELETE_DATE) VALUES (#{userId}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{password}, SHA2("enc_key",512))), #{name}, #{sex}, AES_ENCRYPT(#{phone}, SHA2("enc_key",512)), #{age}, now(), now());

INSERT INTO admin (ADMIN_ID, SHOP_NO, PASSWORD, NAME, SEX, PHONE, AGE, INSERT_DATE, DELETE_DATE) VALUES (#{userId}, #{shopNo},HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{password}, SHA2("enc_key",512))), #{name}, #{sex}, AES_ENCRYPT(#{phone}, SHA2("enc_key",512)), #{age}, now(), now());
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS userId, USER_NO, NAME, SEX, AES_DECRYPT(PHONE, SHA2("enc_key",512)) as PHONE, AGE FROM user WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND PASSWORD = HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{password}, SHA2("enc_key",512)))

SELECT ADMIN_ID as userId, ADMIN_NO as adminNo, SHOP_NO as shopNo, NAME, SEX, AES_DECRYPT(PHONE, SHA2("enc_key",512)) as PHONE, AGE, PROFILE, IMG_URL as imgUrl FROM admin WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{userId} AND PASSWORD = HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{password}, SHA2("enc_key",512)))
SELECT ADMIN_ID as userId, ADMIN_NO as adminNo FROM admin WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{map.adminId} AND ADMIN_NO = #{map.adminNo}
